name: Computer Science Saga
description:
(Knight sprite in cover image by OcO; Icons in cover image by Matt Firth (cheekyinkling), game-icons.net)

Computer Science Saga is an android deck-building game that tries to teach you while you play! It was created as part of a high school project. The game is avaliable in portuguese and in english, although there might be some writing errors as it's not my first language.

Bear in mind that it's a Work-In-Progress!

If you decide to play it, please also fill this form to help me with my school project!
